creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: center scroll: male figure wearing gray face mask standing facing viewer with arms outstretched; brocade brown and gold top; billowing blue pants with blue designs; tall black hat; decorated fan in PR hand; face mask has white tassels and goatee
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
signed: LLC: 顕幽齋源一信寫{Kenyūsai Minamoto Kazunobu sha}
title: Okina [center of a triptych of the Noh roles Senzai, Okina, and Sanbaso]
